en.description: While continuing the work on Santander One-App I became iOS reference for my squad. We developed several and diferrent petitions for local countries, but always with a core perspective. Then I changed to OpenBank project and I had to learn a massive project again.

projects.name: Santander One-App
assigments: We were moved from Experis to Plexus but we keep with the ongoing tasks in Experis.

projects.name: Santander One-App
assigments: Development of core modules used by different countries in its local apps

en.description: In Appogeo I was the only iOS developer. This means I had to face challenges for me yet unkown such as provisioning profiles, certificates, and all the requeriments needed to upload to TestFlight / AppStore

projects.name: Clever Care
assigments: Development of core modules used by different countries in its local apps
